name: react-ts-css
description: React CSS modules - VS code extension for CSS modules support in React projects written in typescript.Supports Definitions, Hover , Completion Providers and Diagnostics
author: Viijay-Kr

reactTsScss.peekProperties.description: Peek the block of css or scss properties on Hovering a selector

reactTsScss.autoImport.description: Auto import css/scss modules on completion

reactTsScss.definition.description: Go to definition of scoped and cyclic selectors

reactTsScss.diagnostics.description: Provide Diagnostics and Code Actions for non existing selectors and non existing css modules

reactTsScss.tsconfig.title: TS Config Path
reactTsScss.tsconfig.description: Location of tsconfig.json inside the project.This config is used to resolve path aliases by the extension

reactTsScss.baseDir.title: Base Dir Path
reactTsScss.baseDir.description: Base directory path inside the project. Defaults to 'src'

reactTsScss.cssAutoComplete.title: Autocomplete CSS variables
reactTsScss.cssAutoComplete.description: Auto completion of css variables from various files

reactTsScss.cssDefinitions.title: Go to CSS variables definition
reactTsScss.cssDefinitions.description: Definition provider for css variables from various files

reactTsScss.cssSyntaxColor.title: Syntax Coloring for CSS variables
reactTsScss.cssSyntaxColor.description: Color preview and presentation for CSS variables

reactTsScss.typecriptCleanUpDefs.title: Enable/Disable Typescript cleanup definitions plugin
reactTsScss.typecriptCleanUpDefs.description: Typescript cleanup definitions plugin can be disabled with this setting. 'reactTsScss.cleanUpDefs' will have no effect when this setting is false

reactTsScss.cleanUpDefs.title: Typescript Cleanup Definitions
reactTsScss.cleanUpDefs.description: Add a declaration file to skip definition results from this file. Useful for skipping unnecessary defintions from boilder plate projects

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
